Class Node

extends java.lang.Object

Represents an internal implementation of a node in the graph

Constructor Summary
Node(int nodeId, java.util.ArrayList<Edge> edgeList)
          Constructor that gives only the general structure of the node (without the actual mapping to the RDFNode) This is useful when we want to add the RDFNode and update the other parameters later on via set commands

Constructor that gives only the general structure of the node (without the actual mapping to the RDFNode) This is useful when we want to add the RDFNode and update the other parameters later on via set commands

nodeId - - Id for identifying this node
edgeList - - A list containing the edges that connect this node to other nodes
